Description: Dean VMNTX UA Electric Guitar Dave Mustaine of Megadeth United Abominations V. Condition is Used. The Dave Mustaine United Abominations Electric Guitar has all the great attributes of the Dave Mustaine VMNTX, but also features awesome United Abominations graphics. With a basswood body and a maple top, a maple neck with a rosewood fretboard, and 2 powerful Dean humbuckers, this is an electric guitar that looks and sounds worthy of the flame-haired metal master's name and of a place in your hands! A string-thru bridge design increases sustain, and the super fast 24-fret neck will have you shredding the night away.
